      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Point4d b)
        Compares this point to other point.

        Points are first compared by the x coordinate, then by the y coordinate, then by the z coordinate, then by the w coordinate

        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Point4d>
        Parameters:
        b - the point to be compared
